name: Composer
description:
Composer is a unique way to write music. It includes hundreds of instruments/drumsets across many styles. You can create music that sounds like a real orchestra, or compose a track that sounds like it's from a retro game console. 

Includes a multi-touch piano with over 100 sounds to choose from - as well as drum pads. Use these to practice, brainstorm a song, or to record in music in real time.
intro: Write music in many styles! Classical, retro, electronic, synth, pop, jazz, etc - with a controller or touchscreen.
